data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Saint-Denis, Reunion.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Saint-Denis, Reunion
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 7,580 believers in the state of Saint-Denis the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Saint-Denis, Reunion today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 7,580 believers in the state of Saint-Denis with tears, because God is not obeyed by those around them.
data.verse: Streams of tears flow from my eyes, for your law is not obeyed.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Saint-Denis
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Saint-Denis, Saint-Denis, Reunion.
Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 7,580 believers in the state of Saint-Denis.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Saint-Denis, Reunion.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Saint-Denis, Reunion a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
